com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration.model.rules

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.configuration.model.rules.Rule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable

    public class Rule
extends Object
implements Cloneable
    Represents the configuration of a Catalys Rules Engine Rule.

      • Rule

        public Rule(String direction,
            String description,
            List<Condition> inclusions,
            List<Condition> exclusions,
            List<Action> actions,
            boolean disabled,
            boolean defaultCase)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        direction - direction of this rule configuration
        description - description of the rule
        inclusions - inclusive conditions
        exclusions - exclusive conditions
        actions - Actions to perform on the message
        disabled - is the rule disabled?
        defaultCase - is this a default rule
